name: Proexe
description:
Our mission is to develop winning IT and VOD/OTT solutions for various businesses to enable people around the world to experience great products or services in mobile reality. At the core of our effectiveness lie formal, higher education and long years of experience that drive the passion for technological change. Such approach gives our clients the highest level of certainty in all aspects of cooperation. This is why we code seriously.
 
Our core competencies are:
- Android (including Android Wear, Android TV, OTT TV BOX ANDROID, Kotlin Native)
- iOS (including Apple Watch, Apple TV)
- Graphic Design (UX and UI designers onboard)
- PHP Laravel server-side and mobile backend
- HTML, CSS, React JS on frontend side
- Dashboard Management Systems
- Ongoing post-launch maintenance
 
Among our clients you may find amazing companies such as:
Samsung
VECTRA
Randstad
Maczfit
Mediapeers
Vanity Style
[startup]AioCare
[startup]MoonyLab
and others...
